Articles.Content:
I was wondering about a full color docking camera mod, and perhaps a more stable offering than romfarer's, in addition to being standalone instead of one piece of a larger modpack. Scott Manley had a few ideas in

. Romfarer's started crashing my game after about half an hour of playing, and I dislike that you can never see anything. I actually wouldn't mind learning how to make this mod, but I have no clue where to even begin. But, supposing somebody wanted to help me learn, I'd be up for that too.
